column1: We continue to be encouraged by the approval of at home COVID-19 tests. My legislation the Safe Testing at Residence Telehealth Act would provide our seniors and other vulnerable populations with timely access to these tests. https://t.co/pbxVTqTYAR
‼️COMING UP: I’ll be joining the House Floor to discuss recent #COVID19 vaccine news and the future of #telehealth. Tune in below 👇  https://t.co/V5PtzapAHJ
Operation Warp Speed is working to produce a safe and effective #COVID19 vaccine for the American people.💉Read more on this news below: https://t.co/HZcE01E5o2

We must hold China accountable for the destruction they’ve caused on a global scale.    ❌Hid #COVID19 information ❌Disrespect for human rights  ❌Threat to international security https://t.co/Tz5Fr2oYgX

#ICYMI: I introduced the Safe Testing at Residence Telehealth Act bipartisan legislation to provide robust at-home #COVID19 testing for seniors and other vulnerable populations.    Read more about the advancements of #telemedicine below⤵️ https://t.co/ugfxAy0Ynj

I'm proud to have my bill to reduce the medical expense deduction threshold for Americans battling high-medical costs in @HouseGOP's Commitment to Defeat the Virus and Keep America Healthy Act.   Learn more about this bipartisan effort to combat #COVID19⤵️ https://t.co/Oi9SpBYROl

Today I introduced the Safe Testing at Residence Telehealth Act of 2020 legislation aimed to provide at home #COVID19 testing for our seniors & more vulnerable populations. We must keep our loved ones safe by advancing healthcare technology. ⬇ https://t.co/ugfxAy0Ynj

‼COMING UP: I will be speaking at 10:30am AZ at #TheHillOlderVoters conference to discuss the important role #telemedicine has played in providing care during the #COVID19 pandemic. We must continue to utilize and expand this technology for everyone. https://t.co/kpQUwIInkv

#Telehealth has been a valuable asset over the course of the #COVID19 pandemic. I am pleased to see veterans utilizing such a great tool for their own health and wellness appointments. Read more on how this technology is helping over 90000 veterans here: https://t.co/v4c9RHiaqQ

I was pleased to meet with the League of Arizona Cities and Towns to discuss the impact #COVID19 has had in AZ and how we can best serve Arizonans moving forward. Thank you to each of our cities for their work to help combat the effects #COVID19 has had on our local economy. https://t.co/YuNqqlyg0q

I am pleased to have cosponsored H.R. 6958 the COVID-19 Dependent Care Flexible Spending Arrangement Rollover Act of 2020 legislation that would prevent Arizona families from losing funds for childcare services due to COVID-19 related closures.

Thank you @ChamberBizNews for the write-up on our entrepreneurship roundtable last week on the impact of COVID-19 on small business startups. I look forward to continuing the dialogue on how to help Arizona’s entrepreneurial community. https://t.co/DAJc3xkM3x

🚨Alert: Be cautious of fraudulent unemployment insurance debit cards being disguised as COVID-19 relief sent to your home. If you receive one you can take the card to @ArizonaDES as soon as possible. For more information read below: https://t.co/V0iMhf6lk5

Today I joined @startupsUSAorg and my fellow Entrepreneurship Caucus Co-Chairs @RepFrenchHill and @RepBillFoster for a bipartisan conversation with #smallbiz owners on the impacts of COVID-19. https://t.co/nDFNLSICUJ

The #COVID19 pandemic has brought upon unprecedented times leaving many feeling down. This #MentalIllnessAwarenessWeek reach out to somebody you know who may be struggling and let them know that they are #NotAlone.

My Democratic colleagues’ bill is still full of partisan proposals not related to #COVID19 - including defunding resources for our police. This is not the time for the left to be pushing political priorities which is why I could not support passage. (2/2)

Thank you @CandyUSA for inviting me to speak with some of your members today about the effects of the #COVID19 pandemic on the industry and policies to help safely reopen our businesses and economy. 🍫🍭🍬 https://t.co/8FtdBev9gU

Looking for ways to help in our community? Individuals who have tested positive for #COVID19 and recovered are encouraged to donate plasma to help others fight the virus. Learn more below ⬇️ https://t.co/uTon1ZQShi

I’m pleased to see the federal government continuing to support our state’s fight against #COVID19. These rapid tests will be incredibly valuable for our schools nursing homes and other at-risk communities. https://t.co/FrZLYELbl2

We must hold China accountable for their continued disrespect for human rights hiding information about #COVID19 and the threat they pose to international security.   I encourage you to read the report from @China_TaskForce to learn about steps needed to hold China accountable. https://t.co/phsueIu1mb https://t.co/Fz1rLpwZJZ

Today I signed onto a petition to reopen funds available for #PPPloans. We must utilize the unused funds from previous #COVID19 packages to ensure our businesses who are unable to reopen can continue to be supported. I urge my Democratic colleagues to join Republicans in signing! https://t.co/pLhwLd5ySN
💉Are you interested in participating in a #COVID19 vaccine trial? Look below to find a location near you to sign-up. #OperationWarpSpeed🇺🇸 https://t.co/mpzBz2U0DE

Our office is continuing to assist #AZ06 constituents with delayed stimulus checks tax returns passports and more due to #COVID19. If you are in need of assistance with a federal agency please don't hesitate to contact us:  📞 (480) 946-2411 📧 https://t.co/F8U8ewjFz9

Too many Americans and seniors are experiencing financial hardship from high medical costs which have only been amplified by #COVID19.   My legislation will reduce the medical expense deduction rate to 5% for the next two years to provide critical relief. https://t.co/tTjGWhazcJ

Our #CommitmentToAmerica includes creating a safe and effective #COVID19 vaccine for the American people. It’s clear that vaccines save lives and will help us restore normalcy following this pandemic.   Click here for more #OperationWarpSpeed information: https://t.co/aReEkUnjXG https://t.co/VITmVyCbjG

Not a single vote brought to the floor on #COVID19 relief by @SpeakerPelosi this week.   Additional unemployment insurance has expired businesses are struggling to keep their doors open and schools need resources for safely re-opening. We must pass targeted relief immediately. https://t.co/hrA8QUWzYm

‼️Republicans are fighting for the American people by working to:   ⚖️Restore our way of life post-COVID19 💰Rebuild the greatest economy ♻️Renew the American dream  Together we can create economic growth and opportunity for everyone. https://t.co/fFhGt3xAbs

Thank you to all of our local leaders working to ensure our communities are continuing in the right direction with regards to #COVID19 safety measures. Allowing municipalities to make enforcement decisions has helped cut our state’s cases.  Read more here👇https://t.co/haWNxErETA

Republicans want immediate relief for the American people. #COVID19 has brought unprecedented financial hardship to our workforce families schools and businesses.   I’m disappointed to see Democrats are continuing to block targeted relief for Americans who are hurting. https://t.co/mMaq55cT6z

Today on #WorldSuicidePreventionDay let’s all take time to check in with our friends & family. The #COVID19 pandemic has brought on an unprecedented level of isolation and stress for Americans. We must all work together to protect the health and well-being of our loved ones. 🙏🏼 https://t.co/gUzygScYGN
🚨 If your small business and nonprofit is experiencing financial hardship during #COVID19 you may be eligible for a local grant. Reminder to check out the opportunities here: https://t.co/ImMeIJtddl

The #CARESAct is continuing to help Arizona fight #COVID19. I’m pleased to see funding will be helping the Navajo Tribal Utility Authority connect 500+ families to the power grid. Read more about this project here. ⬇️  https://t.co/Oojyo85K44

.@ASU has partnered with @AZDHS to provide free #COVID19 testing for our communities. In efforts of getting our kids safely back to school children 5+ are able to get tested too.   If you would like to get a test click the link below to register.👇 https://t.co/jTK1Bk0Frm

As we head into a holiday weekend let’s remember to continue our individual efforts to further Arizona’s #COVID19 mitigation. I hope everyone stays safe with friends and family while keeping cool during their outdoor activities. 🇺🇸 #LDW

The @SBAgov #PPP has helped thousands of small businesses since the start of #COVID19. This program has supported over 50 million jobs nationwide and approved more than 4.8 million loans for those facing financial hardships due to forced closures. ⬇️ https://t.co/ziMvod1ZdG
TODAY: Free #COVID19 saliva testing at @ASU stadium. For more information and registration please click the link below. ⬇️⬇️  https://t.co/jTK1BjJ4zO
This is great news for our schools nursing homes and workplaces. Great work by the Trump Administration to secure this efficient #COVID19 testing for Americans. https://t.co/Blc7fOqNyr

We must continue to support expansion of this technology to ensure #telehealth is fully accessible post-#COVID19.   ✍️ Learn more about my legislation to make access to #telehealth permanent below ⬇️ https://t.co/P3N8o1ncO2 https://t.co/9h8Pzs3M15

Pleased to see more Arizona businesses will be opening today. Let’s remember to wear our masks and practice basic health safety measures so that we can continue to stay open while maintaining our #COVID19 mitigation efforts. https://t.co/X7EPkdzHkT

Pleased to see our efforts as a community are working to mitigate the spread of #COVID19. Let’s keep up the good work by following safety precautions wearing masks and social distancing to stop this virus. 🦠 https://t.co/rRXTq2z0uL

Be sure to check out the new Arizona Economic Dashboard a  tool for business owners to use when making decisions during #COVID19. Thank you @phxchamber for putting together this resource! #AZEconDashboard ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/fBwbEPHcdS https://t.co/lJaZDJ2mQD

I am pleased to see local businesses coming together at the Inaugural Arizona COVID-19 Consortium to help slow the spread of #COVID19 in our community &  highlight new technologies we have available to create a safer & healthier society.  Read more here⬇️  https://t.co/6eRPuzlcPx

If you’re a #SmallBiz owner in AZ who was forced to shut down due to #COVID19 you may be eligible for mortgage and rent relief through this program. Apply here👇 https://t.co/vkKRCGEq8D https://t.co/2NKzjvLQyR

📌My office has been working hard to find & provide #COVID19 resources for you. For further information on:  🏦Unemployment Insurance➡️https://t.co/lX2uitMHkN 👩‍🏫Education➡️https://t.co/Ho62Y7zwIS 🏢Small businesses➡️https://t.co/SZfa3mr4hW  ☎️Or contact my office at: 480-946-2411

This morning I spoke with the Ambassador of India about their #COVID19 response our collaborations on medical research & how we can work towards free and fair trade between our nations. I hope someday soon I can travel back to India and enjoy your beautiful & diverse culture.

This weekend @AZSportsEnt will be hosting free #COVID19 testing along with rapid antibody tests.   📅When: Saturday August 22 from 9am-1pm 📍Where: 15100 N 78th Way Scottsdale   Appointments are required please register here👇 https://t.co/pqbTXIvwis

🚨Unemployment Insurance: If you have lost your source of income during the course of the #COVID19 pandemic you may qualify for unemployment benefits recently extended to the state of Arizona.  For a detailed guide to apply please visit my website here⬇️ https://t.co/TMmdU27xfn

I appreciated the opportunity yesterday to meet with Arizona constituent members of @GrammyAdvocacy @RecordingAcad to discuss the impact of #COVID19 on our local musician community. 🎶🎤🎷  Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with me. https://t.co/FS1ArjGQr4

#ICYMI: Legislation I introduced was passed by the House to enhance the security and reliability of U.S. supply chains during the #COVID19 pandemic for essential medical equipment and supplies through technologies such as #blockchain.   Read more here👇 https://t.co/SkQEHMG2iT

✍️I led a letter with my colleagues in the Arizona delegation requesting an immediate influx of federal resources for our state.   We must continue to provide access to testing and other resources to fight #COVID19.   Read more here ⬇️ https://t.co/ASDElijvsS

#ICYMI: I introduced a bipartisan bill to continue the use of telehealth beyond the Coronavirus pandemic.  Telehealth is part of the future for how we provide care and I believe should be a permanent for all Americans to access.   For more information: https://t.co/P3N8o15BWu

It was great to join the @ASU Congressional Conference today to discuss the impact of #COVID19 in our state and the different innovative policies I have introduced to provide real relief for Arizonans affected by this virus.    Thanks for inviting me to join a great discussion! https://t.co/7CnEuxBHhW

My Democratic colleagues are continuing to block #COVID19 resources this week.   The President's actions on Saturday show Republicans want to provide immediate resources for Americans who are unable to safely return to work. Now it is time for Congress to do so.

Did you know: Once the #COVID19 pandemic is declared over our expansion of #telemedicine will go away.   I've introduced legislation with my colleagues on the #TelehealthCaucus to permanently expand this accessible and cost-effective care. Learn more ⬇️ https://t.co/4ZS858W4Rz
